external_references.source_name: Nicolas Falliere, Liam O Murchu, Eric Chien February 2011
external_references.description: Nicolas Falliere, Liam O Murchu, Eric Chien 2011, February W32.Stuxnet Dossier (Version 1.4) Retrieved. 2017/09/22

objects.description: [Stuxnet](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0603) encodes the payload of system information sent to the command and control servers using a one byte 0xFF XOR key. [Stuxnet](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0603) also uses a 31-byte long static byte string to XOR data sent to command and control servers. The servers use a different static key to encrypt replies to the implant.(Citation: Nicolas Falliere, Liam O Murchu, Eric Chien February 2011)
